name: PDFViewDelegate
desc: The delegate for the PDFView object.

items.name: func pdfViewWillChangeScaleFactor(PDFView, toScale: CGFloat) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Overrides changes to the scale factor.

items.name: func pdfViewWillClick(onLink: PDFView, with: URL)
items.desc: Handle clicks on URL links in a view.

items.name: func pdfViewPrintJobTitle(PDFView) -> String
items.desc: Overrides the job title used when the PDFView is printed.
